entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Matagami Airport 2:53 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure: 98.3 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: E 33 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
